item.title: Kaisa 暂时避免了清算，但需要重组计划
item.description: 香港法院给了中国开发商凯撒集团控股有限公司七个星期的时间来制定债务计划，以避免被清算，但同时也警告说，这可能是该公司最后的机会。【原文：A Hong Kong court has given Chinese developer Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd. seven more weeks to work on its debt plan in order to avoid being liquidated, but also warned this might be the company’s last chance.】

item.title: 巴西健身房连锁店 Smart Fit 确认与 Velocity 商谈入股事宜
item.description: Smartfit Escola de Ginástica e Dança SA 是拉丁美洲最大的健身连锁店之一，该公司表示正在洽谈收购控股公司 Velocity Academia de Ginástica 的股份。【原文：Smartfit Escola de Ginástica e Dança SA, one of the largest fitness chains in Latin America, said it’s in talks to acquire shares in closely held Velocity Academia de Ginástica.】

item.title: 日本贸易公司三井物产收购得克萨斯州页岩气资产
item.description: 日本贸易公司三井物产株式会社（Mitsui & Co.Ltd 收购了德克萨斯州的一处页岩气资产，并计划在 2026 年后进行全面开发。【原文：Japanese trading house Mitsui & Co. Ltd bought a shale gas asset in Texas that it seeks to bring to full-scale development after 2026.】

item.title: 印度 110 亿美元 Quant 共同基金面临监管机构调查
item.description: Quant Mutual Fund 在周日晚些时候的一份声明中表示，已收到印度股票市场监管机构的询问，并将全力配合审查。【原文：Quant Mutual Fund has received inquiries from India’s stock-market regulator and is fully committed to complying with the review, the multi-asset manager said in a statement late Sunday.】

item.title: 金色通道液化天然气承包商 Zachry 称已提出成本问题
item.description: 金色通道液化天然气出口设施的主要承包商 Zachry Holdings Inc.【原文：Zachry Holdings Inc., the lead contractor of the Golden Pass liquefied natural gas export facility, said it received assurances in 2022 and 2023 that it would be paid for its work, despite mounting costs at the massive Texas plant.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 中国和欧盟将举行贸易谈判。日本准备干预货币市场。亚洲股市将下跌。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。【原文：China and the EU to hold trade talks. Japan ready to intervene in currency markets. Asian stocks set to drop. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 激进派 Engine Capital 要求出售 Magners 苹果酒制造商 C&C
item.description: 据知情人士透露，激进投资者引擎资本（Engine Capital）已持有麦格纳爱尔兰苹果酒制造商 C&C Group Plc 的股份。【原文：Activist investor Engine Capital has amassed a stake in C&C Group Plc, the maker of Magners Irish Cider, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 调查显示，2024 年股市上涨后将面临微弱上行空间
item.description:
黄金有望上涨，国债收益率将下降

。【原文：

Gold is expected to advance, Treasury yields to fall

】

item.title: 亚航新掌门人称，随着旅游业蓬勃发展，高机票价格将持续存在
item.description: 据亚洲最大的廉价航空公司称，高昂的机票价格是 "大瘟疫 "后全球旅游热潮的支柱，这种现象不会结束。【原文：There’s no end in sight to the high airfares that are a mainstay of the world’s post-pandemic travel boom, according to Asia’s biggest low-cost carrier.】

item.title: 受内地需求影响，香港租金达到大流行前水平
item.description: 随着中国大陆学生和专业人士蜂拥而至，香港的租金价格终于恢复到大流行前的水平。【原文：Hong Kong’s rental prices have finally recovered to pre-pandemic levels as mainland Chinese students and professionals flock to the city.】

item.title: 石油跌幅扩大，风险厌恶情绪抵消了更多船只遇袭的影响
item.description: 石油连续第二个交易日下跌，原因是也门附近船只遇袭事件不断升级，大市场的风险偏好基调与之相对应。【原文：Oil declined for a second session as a risk-off tone in broader markets countered escalating attacks on ships near Yemen.】

item.title: 日本神田表示如有需要可全天 24 小时进行干预
item.description: 日本最高货币官员神田正人（Masato Kanda）告诉记者，如果认为有必要采取行动，日本当局随时准备 24 小时干预货币市场。【原文：Japan’s top currency official Masato Kanda told reporters the country’s authorities stand ready to intervene in the currency markets 24 hours a day if action is deemed necessary.】

item.title: 诺林丘金公司第二次投资失败的明确警告
item.description: 日本金融监管机构对 Norinchukin 的警告非常明确：该公司对外国债券持有的严重依赖是一种风险战略，必须改变。【原文：The warning for Norinchukin from Japan’s financial regulator was clear — its deep reliance on foreign bond holdings was a risky strategy and needed to change.】

item.title: 国家债务风险加剧，印尼债券受创程度为亚洲之最
item.description: 由于对印尼债务的担忧不断升温，过去两周印尼国营电力公司的美元债券在亚洲的跌幅最大。这给当地借款人带来了压力，他们面临着 60 亿美元的到期债务，将一直持续到 2025 年底。【原文：Indonesian state-run power utility’s dollar bonds have suffered the most in Asia over the past two weeks due to rising concerns about the nation’s debt. This has pressured local borrowers, who face $6 billion in maturities through the end of 2025.】

item.title: 随着指数日期的临近，转而购买印度长期限债券的情况有所扩大
item.description: 印度的外国债券投资者正在锁定收益率，因为有迹象表明，在证券被纳入摩根大通公司指数之前，印度央行将继续维持高利率。【原文：Foreign bond investors in India are locking in yields amid signs the central bank is sticking with its high interest rates in the run-up to the securities being included in JPMorgan Chase & Co. indexes.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将在 CPI 和大选周下滑：市场综述
item.description: 本周亚洲股市将下跌，其中包括通胀措施，这将有助于引导对全球利率前景的押注。【原文：Asian stocks are set to fall into a week that includes measures of inflation that will help guide bets on the outlook for global interest rates.】

item.title: 保诚将回购价值 20 亿美元的保险公司自有股票
item.description: 保诚保险公司（Prudential Plc）启动了一项价值 20 亿美元的股票回购计划，该计划最迟将于 2026 年中期完成。【原文：Prudential Plc launched a $2 billion share buyback program that will be completed no later than the middle of 2026, as the insurer outlined progress that includes the potential for further cash returns to shareholders.】

item.title: 银行达成协议让澳大利亚现金速递公司继续运营
item.description: 澳大利亚的大型银行和杂货店同意向陷入困境的现金运输公司 Linfox Armaguard Pty Ltd. 注资 5,000 万澳元（3,300 万美元），此举将使纸币和硬币继续在经济领域流通。【原文：Large banks and grocers in Australia agreed to a deal to inject A$50 million ($33 million) into the struggling cash-transportation firm Linfox Armaguard Pty Ltd., a move that keeps bank notes and coins flowing around the economy.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 从铝到锌，基本金属将成为在香港举行的 LME 亚洲周年度会议的焦点。在未来几十年里，电动汽车将取代汽油车，最终将消耗大量能源。而俄罗斯天然气仍在欧洲占有一席之地。【原文：From aluminum to zinc, base metals will be in the spotlight during the annual LME Asia Week gathering in Hong Kong. The electric vehicles that are poised to replace gas guzzlers in the coming decades will end up consuming a good chunk of energy themselves. And Russian natural gas still has a hold over Europe.】

item.title: 中国开发商凯撒重返法庭参加清算听证会
item.description: 很少有中国开发商能像凯撒集团控股有限公司（Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd.）一样，象征着解决房地产债务危机的漫长道路。【原文：Few Chinese developers symbolize the long path to resolving the property debt crisis quite like Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd., which will be trying to fend off liquidation in a Hong Kong court Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 1 170 亿美元养老金引发更多房地产动荡
item.description: 澳大利亚第三大养老基金--规模达 1,750 亿澳元（1,170 亿美元）的 Aware Super 养老基金，正在全球房地产资产中狩猎，以期在本周结束的本财年强劲投资业绩的基础上再接再厉。【原文：Australia’s third-largest pension fund, A$175 billion ($117 billion) Aware Super, is hunting among global real-estate assets as it seeks to build on strong investment results from the financial year that ends this week.】

item.title: 从 Nvidia 到 Chipotle，股票分割又回来了。原因如下
item.description: 欢迎阅读《首席财务官简报》（CFO Briefing），这是一份关于企业财务和领导者需要了解的信息的时事通讯。本周的重点内容包括：为什么股票分割会成为留住员工的工具、3M 公司如何为潜在的新诉讼做准备以及财务主管们担心的问题。【原文：Welcome to CFO Briefing, a newsletter devoted to corporate finance and what leaders need to know. This week’s highlights include why stock splits are turning into employee-retention tools, how 3M prepares for potential new litigation, and what finance chiefs worry about.】

item.title: 高利率会持续多久？债券市场认为可能永远如此
item.description: 就在投资者对美国国债反弹即将起飞的乐观情绪日益高涨之际，债券市场的一个关键指标却发出了令人担忧的信号，让那些打算入市的投资者感到担忧。【原文：Just as optimism is growing among investors that a rally in US Treasuries is about to take off, one key indicator in the bond market is flashing a worrying sign for anyone thinking about piling in.】

item.title: 对冲基金看涨铜的押注遭遇中国经济放缓
item.description:
铜在对冲基金资金的推动下飙升至创纪录水平。现在，多头面临的最大问题是中国买家何时会回归。【原文：

Copper surged to a record on a wave of hedge fund money. Now the big question for bulls is when China’s buyers will return.

】

item.title: RXO 同意以 10 亿美元收购 UPS 旗下 Coyote 物流公司
item.description: RXO 公司已同意以超过 10 亿美元的价格收购联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service Inc.【原文：RXO Inc. has agreed to buy United Parcel Service Inc.’s asset-light freight brokerage business, Coyote Logistics, for more than $1 billion.】

item.title: 英伟达销售额增长之快令华尔街望尘莫及
item.description: Nvidia Corp. 是 S&P 500 指数中最昂贵的股票，其股价约为该公司未来 12 个月预计销售额的 23 倍。【原文：Nvidia Corp. is the most expensive stock in the S&P 500 Index, with its shares trading for roughly 23 times the company’s projected sales over the next 12 months.】

item.title: 大型食品公司试图用维生素和膳食抵消肥胖症药物的打击
item.description: 所谓的 "Ozempic 革命 "使食品和饮料公司的市值减少了数十亿美元。但是，新的减肥药至少给以前需求低迷的一个产品系列带来了动力：酸奶。【原文：The so-called Ozempic Revolution has wiped billions off the market value of food and drink companies. But new weight-loss drugs are giving a boost to at least one line of products that have sometimes previously faced sluggish demand: yogurt.】

item.title: OQ 化学公司削减贷款协议后将启动销售程序
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，OQ Chemicals GmbH 的阿曼所有者在与贷款人达成短期融资协议后，将启动该公司的销售程序。【原文：The Omani owner of OQ Chemicals GmbH is set to kick off a sales process for the business after the company reached a short-term financing deal with lenders, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国肖尔茨表示希望勒庞不要赢得法国大选
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）涉足法国政坛，表示希望玛丽娜-勒庞领导的极右翼国民联盟（National Rally）不会在法国议会选举中获胜。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz waded into French politics by voicing his hopes that Marine Le Pen’s far-right National Rally won’t win the country’s parliamentary elections.】

item.title: 导致美国汽车经销商瘫痪的黑客攻击事件正在解决中
item.description: 目标供应商 CDK Global 表示，导致北美数千家汽车经销商业务停顿的软件黑客攻击事件目前正在解决过程中。【原文：A software hack that brought business to a halt at thousands of car dealerships in North America is now in the process of getting resolved, the targeted provider CDK Global said.】
